name: A Catchy Game
description:
🤍 V1.0 IS NOW RELEASED!

A CATCHY GAME

🧺 A Catchy Game is a solo game where you collect fruits for a certain limited time. From strawberries, cherries, bananas to pineapples. The full version of the game will have multiple powerups which each have a unique function. The only powerup that is available for free in the game is a basket which helps you collect items, it can move so that it follows the player with a certain speed.

💀 At the moment there are only 3 hostile entities in the game: Smile, Spikeball and Delivery Guy. The enemies will do everything possible to cause you a "GAME OVER" each one attacking you in a different and varied way.

🏃 In this game you can RUN! Introducing the stamina bar which you can use by holding the "Shift" key while walking. When your character gets tired from running a lot, the bar will indicate that he is tired and will deactivate it until it recharges completely.

🏆 In this game you can get ACHIEVEMENTS, which are achieved through certain events that happen in the game and can even be achieved by getting a certain number of collectibles in your total games (collectibles are saved in your user profile). At the moment the achievements do not serve any other function other than appearing on your profile, but soon they will be given some functions and rewards!
